about_the_game: Anime Artist 3 comes with a 18+ free patch that allows you to see the full, uncensored beauty of the models featured in our "Private Pics" section!

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, General Mature Content, Sexual content

This DLC also includes Adult only content, intense nudity, consensual and explicit sexual activities. All girls are 20+ years old or more

detailed_description: Anime Artist 3 comes with a 18+ free patch that allows you to see the full, uncensored beauty of the models featured in our "Private Pics" section!
name: Anime Artist 3 - Lewd Patch
